name: Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods
fourPiece: After using an Elemental Skill, gain a 20% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s. While under a shield granted by the Crystallize reaction, the above effect will be increased by 150%, and this additional increase disappears 1s after that shield is lost.

goblet.name: Magnanimous Ink Bottle
goblet.description: An ink bottle utilized by the witch in the story. It possesses a strange enchantment no less powerful than the one cast upon the dip pen.

plume.name: Honest Quill
plume.description: The witch in the tale used this dip pen. Among its various advantages, its silky-smooth writing is the least worthy of mention.

circlet.name: Compassionate Ladies' Hat
circlet.description: The lady's hat favored by the witch in the story. She loved this piece of headwear for how it weaves together solemnity and playfulness.

flower.name: Selfless Floral Accessory
flower.description: A brooch that the witch in the tale wore. As with the other ornaments she loved, this was characterized by butterfly-like shapes.

sands.name: Faithful Hourglass
sands.description: A sand timepiece that the witch relied on in the story. Legend has it that if you recite the wrong incantation over it, time will suddenly flow exceptionally quickly.
